Articles.Content:
I don't have link for the craft,but it is very simple.

Take a tree crew command pod(good result with the mk1-2),place one flt-32 fuel tank(the biggest) under it.place some flt-16 fuel tank around,at the bottom of the first tank,place a lvt-30(the big one)turned upward on each of the flt-16 fuel tank.

One of the lvt-30 have to be accessible by the crew(they have to go *on* the flt-30).

the experiment:

light the motor,and put the throttle to full power,eva with one astronaute and go in the center of the flt-30,he will be launched in the air(I did a 4530 meter launch).

I told you it was sadistic....

By the way,i've found a bug:i landed on(*or near) the angled surface of the launch pad and the astronaut.....bounced.
